resources.string: Android Trivia will help you learn some of the most important concepts in Android development and jogg your memory about the previously-learnt topics.
After starting the trivia, Select an answer from the available ones. When you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question. If you answer wrong, the trivia ends.
Test your knowledge on some of the most important concepts in Android development.
Don\'t be sad! You will get it the next time.
Congratulations! You can retake the trivia if you like.
